paragraphs.body: The South Sea is a large, open body of water ${link_0} between the southern ${link_1}, the Southern ${link_2} territories, and the ${link_3}.
paragraphs.text: The South Sea is a large, open body of water located between the southern Earth Kingdom, the Southern Air Nomad territories, and the Southern Water Tribe.

paragraphs.body: Since 40 ${link_0}, the ${link_1} ${link_2} conducted the ${link_3} from the South Sea. Over time, the Fire Nation military activity in the area decreased. By the latter stages of the ${link_4}, only the ${link_5} were still active in larger numbers in the South Sea. They consistently raided the coastal settlements of the southern Earth Kingdom and the Southern Water Tribe.
paragraphs.text: Since 40 AG, the Fire Nation Navy conducted the Southern Water Tribe raids from the South Sea. Over time, the Fire Nation military activity in the area decreased. By the latter stages of the Hundred Year War, only the Southern Raiders were still active in larger numbers in the South Sea. They consistently raided the coastal settlements of the southern Earth Kingdom and the Southern Water Tribe.

paragraphs.text: Dark spirits attacked several ships in the South Sea in 171 AG.

paragraphs.body: After the end of the Hundred Year War, the South Sea became a place of great commercial activity with many transport ships, such as large ${link_0}, passing through it. However, several ships in the Southern Water Tribe's waters were ${link_1} by ${link_2} in 171 AG.
paragraphs.text: After the end of the Hundred Year War, the South Sea became a place of great commercial activity with many transport ships, such as large steamships, passing through it. However, several ships in the Southern Water Tribe's waters were attacked by dark spirits in 171 AG.

paragraphs.body: ${link_0} ${link_1} formed a blockade around the South Pole during the ${link_2}. While passing through the South Sea, one Northern battleship that transported prisoners of war was attacked by ${link_3}.
paragraphs.text: Northern Water Tribe battleships formed a blockade around the South Pole during the Water Tribe Civil War. While passing through the South Sea, one Northern battleship that transported prisoners of war was attacked by Team Avatar.

paragraphs.body: The South Sea extends from the southern coast of the continental Earth Kingdom to the islands that form the nation's southernmost territories. It also spans from ${link_0} and the former ${link_1} territories to the west to the narrow strait between the Earth Kingdom and the central of three large islands in the east. Activity in the South Sea is infrequent: while ${link_2} is a somewhat popular destination among traders and travelers, there is minimal ${link_3} traffic, as the bordering areas have little strategic importance.
paragraphs.text: The South Sea extends from the southern coast of the continental Earth Kingdom to the islands that form the nation's southernmost territories. It also spans from Whaletail Island and the former Air Nomad territories to the west to the narrow strait between the Earth Kingdom and the central of three large islands in the east. Activity in the South Sea is infrequent: while Kyoshi Island is a somewhat popular destination among traders and travelers, there is minimal military traffic, as the bordering areas have little strategic importance.

paragraphs.body: The Earth Kingdom coastline bordering the sea is fairly uneven, with a large inlet at the mouth of the ${link_0}. The only coastal city of note is ${link_1}. Though the sea is bordered by several large islands, including Whaletail Island, the only island of note in the area is Kyoshi Island.
paragraphs.text: The Earth Kingdom coastline bordering the sea is fairly uneven, with a large inlet at the mouth of the Nan Shan River. The only coastal city of note is Chin Village. Though the sea is bordered by several large islands, including Whaletail Island, the only island of note in the area is Kyoshi Island.

paragraphs.body: The South Sea is rich in ${link_0}, including many species of fish, like the ${link_1}, and sea serpents, like the ${link_2}. As such, fishing is a major industry in surrounding regions.
paragraphs.text: The South Sea is rich in marine life, including many species of fish, like the elephant koi, and sea serpents, like the unagi. As such, fishing is a major industry in surrounding regions.
